name: XPX
description: The XPX token is an innovative cryptocurrency designed to provide great utility and value to its holders. Built on SmartDeFi technology, XPX features asset-backing that ensures a perpetual increase in its baseline value. Another feature is Smart loans which allows for 30 day loans against Asset backing. The ecosystem includes XPX PAY payments solutions, a Web3 marketplace offering exclusive discounts and rewards, and innovative NFT integrations. XPX also rewards stakers with great passive rewards. With unique tokenomics on the Binance Smart Chain and plans to be on BASE network, tapping in one of the hottest markets. XPX offers a versatile and durable solution in the DeFi space, with a team that is working non stop to bring this utility for the community and the whole crypto space. All this with Twice audited contract including by Peckchield. XPX is operating with Staking, Smart Loans & asset backing right out the gate while team is working to bring the other Utility to life.
